name: unique-characters
description: Crawl a website based on the sitemap and return a list of all unique characters used.
author: Jan Aagaard <jan@aagaard.net>

scripts.clean: yarn install --immutable && rimraf wwwroot && copyfiles --up 1 "src/*.{html,png}" wwwroot
scripts.update-packages: yarn upgrade && npx syncyarnlock -k -s && yarn install
